Message:
“I only pretended
to be your friend
so I could find the
location of the oasis.

Otherwise, who would ever
befriend a stupid girl
like you?”

Liberia’s hand began to shake
as it held the dagger.
Then tears began to
well in her eyes...

The People of the Sand
gazed at Liberia with pity,
before glaring at me with hate.
As I lunged to grab Liberia,

she squeezed her
eyes shut tightly,
still holding firmly
to her dagger.

I grabbed hold of
Liberia’s hand...
and stabbed myself
with her dagger.

This...will save you...
All you did was
finish off your enemy...
Me, the one
who betrayed you...

As I crumpled forward,
Liberia still tried to
hold me upright.

“The two of us...
should never have met
after all...huh...?”

But, I don’t have any regrets.
After all, I got to become
friends with you, Liberia...

So, it’s alright...
I’m fine...with things
ending like this...
